description: Demolition of existing wooden "lean to" and steel garage to rear and Erection of single storey rear extension (6.00m in depth, maximum height of 2.90m and eaves height of 2.90m)
decision_conditions: The proposed extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii) of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
Condition 5 (Dust Management Plan) - RBK Environmental Health have reviewed the information submitted and are satisfied this is acceptable

Please amend the Block Plan to show the proposed works as hatched or shaded in relation to the existing dwelling, site boundaries and any outbuildings on site. The Block Plan must show the direction of North, be drawn at an identified standard metric scale (such as 1:200 or 1:500) and should also show adjoining properties to the side and rear and those opposite in full outline.
